about.title: About me
paragraphs:
Hello, my name is Rafael Escobar!
I'm a young Information Systems student at FIAP and an aspiring .NET and JavaScript programmer from S�o Paulo, Brasil. I like coffee, soccer and trucks.

contents.title: Technical Support 1 and 2 at FIAP
contents.activities: help and support the students and others employees via remote access (Trauma Zer0), basic administration and maintaince in the firewall (Fortinet) and in the AD, DHCP and Share and Storage servers, management of the printers' supriments and the damaged equipments and control of the laboratory monitors team.
contents.technologies: company's internal system, Fortinet firewall and Trauma Zer0 Suit.

contents.title: Technical Support 1 Intern at FIAP
contents.activities: help and support the students and others employees via remote access (Trauma Zer0), basic administration and maintaince in the firewall (Fortinet) and in the AD, DHCP and Share and Storage servers, management of the printers' supriments and the damaged equipments and control of the laboratory monitors team.
contents.technologies: company's internal system, Fortinet firewall and Trauma Zer0 Suit.

contents.title: Laboratory Monitor at FIAP
contents.duration: 1 year and 5 months, from february 2013 to june 2014.
contents.activities: organize the IT laboratories, help and support the students and others employees, watch over the equipments (including the user's access) and the maintance of the computers.

contents.title: Information Systems at FIAP
contents.duration: prediction of 4 years, from the 1º semester of 2014 to the 2º semester of 2017.

contents.title: Technical Secondary School at COPI
contents.duration: 3 years, from the 1º semester of 2011 to the 2º semester of 2013.

contents.title: Fábrica de Desenvolvimento ("Development Factory") 2014
contents.coverage: C# and JavaScript languages, dynamic web pages programming with ASP.NET MVC, RESTful services with ASP.NET Web API, object-relational mapping with Entity Framework (code first), jQuery, Ajax, unit tests with the Visual Studio and design patterns.

contents.title: Fábrica de Desenvolvimento ("Development Factory") 2013
contents.coverage: C# and JavaScript languages, dynamic web pages programming with ASP.NET MVC, object-relational mapping with Entity Framework (database first), jQuery and good practices of programming.

utils.description: The personal website of a .NET and JavaScript programmer!
utils.keywords: .NET, JavaScript, curriculum, curriculum vitae, cv, personal, rafael, rafael escobar, professional
